Reviews.Title: Looks like the real thing! An awesome decoy!
Reviews.Author: Timothy Tillery
Reviews.Content: You cannot tell the difference between this one and the real thing! I highly recommend this to anyone! This is a great decoy camera!

Reviews.Title: Looks real.
Reviews.Author: dennis
Reviews.Content: Looks real. Forget about the blinking light, don't need it. It's a supposed to make a would be burglar hesitate. Seems to be doing the job.

Reviews.Title: Cheap, effective deterrant
Reviews.Author: Michael Doss
Reviews.Content: What can I say?These are relatively cheap cameras you can throw around your property for a minimal fee.They're made from cheap metallized plastic, and you can throw in a couple of AAA batteries to make a red LED blink on the front.Up close they're obviously fake, but from a distance (especially with the batteries in and the blinking red light on) they are very convincing.For $20 they'll do an excellent job of deterrence.

ProductInfo.Features:
Features Include: Led Light No wiring needed
Installation screws included Adjustable base allows you to set angle of the camera
This is NOT a functioning camera; however it will deter most criminal activity
Realistic appearance -when mounted, no one will know the difference, except for you!
Requires two AAA batteries (not included)Measures: 75 x 325 x 625-Inch
ProductInfo.Name: Trademark Home 72-HH659 Security Camera Decoy with Blinking LED and Adjustable Mount
